lede.hook: The fluorescent lights of Blackwood Corp cast long shadows as I traced the final thread of a $2.3 million mystery.
lede.keyTension: Blake's trusted position made the betrayal all the more devastating

shellAccounts.name: Phoenix Consulting Group
shellAccounts.inference: Shell company with no legitimate operations

pullQuotes.text: We need to clean this up before the quarterly review.
Blake left the room immediately after the accusation.

buriedMarkers.inference: Connection to Diana's consulting agreement remains unclear
Blake and Charlie's shared history may have funded initial scheme

closing.systemicAngle: Corporate oversight failures enabled this scheme to persist for months
closing.accusationHandling: Present Blake and Charlie as primary suspects while noting Diana's potential accessory role
